titles: An advertisement to all learned gentlemen, June 21, 1690. There is newly published a book, intituled, Censura celebriorum authorum : sive, Tractatus in quo varia virorum doctorum de clarissimis cujusque seculi scriptoribus judicia traduntur ... Thomas-Pope Blount ...
author: Chiswell, Richard.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
keywords: Blount, Thomas Pope, --  Sir, 1649-1697. --  Censura celebriorum authorum.
